question: I borrowed money from a bank, didn't know it is haram but can't pay it off, what can I do?

Rasulullah [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam] said, ?To seek knowledge is compulsory upon every Muslim.?%0D%0A%0D%0ATo take an interest bearing loan is prohibited. If you cannot pay the amount immediately, arrange a private loan and pay out the bank as soon as possible to avoid increase on the interest payment.
